name: LT-Innovate
legal: Company Limited by Guarantee - not for profit
goal: LT-Innovate is the Association of the Language Technology Industry. Language Technology makes the world intelligent, multilingual and interactive. LT-Innovate promotes all sectors of LT e.g. translation, speech, analytics.
interests: Business and Industry, Business and Industry, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Foreign affairs and security policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: All initiatives relevant to the language technology industry. These include, but are not limited to: Digital initiatives like New Generation Internet, the Digital Single Market, and legislation touching upon LT in its widest sense. Furthermore, all activities regarding interactive technologies that touch upon LT,  e.g. AI (Artificial Intelligence), machine learning, augmented reality etc.
